Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Cefazolin 0.5-32 μg/mL EPY
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Cefazolin (0.5-32 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Redox indicator for detection of growth
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Cefazolin panel for rapid identification and antimicrobial susceptibility testing using broth microdilution and automated analysis.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates using cefazolin panels, with removal of limitations for Klebsiella oxytoca and Proteus mirabilis.
